messages.subject: Racism, Unschooling, Sandra & Coyote
messages.msgSnippet: Good Morning Everyone, As you know, there have been much said regarding American Indians, racism.....well, you know how this has been. Let me say this; I have
messages.messageBody:
Good Morning Everyone,

As you know, there have been much said regarding American Indians, racism.....well, you know how this has been.


Let me say this;

I have said "I will not speak of this again"
and I did.

I apologize.
I would very much like to stay on this list.
Let us put this behind us.

We all are here, on this list, because we want what's best for our children. We believe that unschooling is what's best.

However, there will be differences of opinion; there will be mis-understandings; there will be words said that are misconstrued; mis-applied, mis-directed.

I believe it is time to put this to bed.

While racism is, sadly, still with us.
The point of this list is unschooling.

Thanks for all the input. I will read and re-read this.

I sincerely apologize for any hurt feelings my words & my anger may have caused.

Janis

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
